bwwExcerpt: Menken's dozen songs, spiced with some undeniably catchy tunes, get the treatment they deserve, backed by a live 12-piece band and put forth by a splendid cast that is not only as good-looking as those in the movie; these performers can actually sing.  And dance. The choreography by Christopher Gattelli is dazzling. The acrobatic moves – leaps and kicks, back flips and mid-air somersaults – put "Newsies" up there with "Memphis" and "Anything Goes" for the most thrilling dancing currently on Broa
